Hftl i G^S^ From Viceroy, Army Department, 15th August .1919.(Received 18th August 1919.)tyX 11126. 15th August. Your telegram of 1st July, 2567. Malleson has beeninformed that the scheme for withdrawal may be held in abeyance for the present owing to conclusion ol! peace with Afghanistan.
